ComicInfo.Summary:
The old Authority is gone. A new Authority has taken its place. Most of the original team was trashed by a new team composed of members with very familiar looks, but sporting all-new code names. Government sponsored and approved, focus-group tested, ethnically and politically diverse, the new Authority plays by a different rule book. They are the keepers of the new world order, and pity anyone dumb enough to stand in their way.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-10-19 07:50:08. [CVDB53641]
